thread.section_title: AllAfrica News: Economy, Business and Finance
thread.title: Kenya: Jambopay Expands to Mombasa

title: Kenya: Jambopay Expands to Mombasa
text:
Kenya: TSC Interdicts Principal, Deputy Over Sex Abuse At Girls' School 
JamboPay CEO Danson Micheni said the company is expanding rapidly within East Africa to ensure clients of 1,500 organisations signed to its network transact money with ease. 
"Services available through JamboPay agencies include payment of water bills, electricity, pay Tv, National Hospital Insurance Fund contributions, Nairobi City fees and taxes, Uchumi Supermarkets, Insurance premiums among others. Mombasa residents will now pay their bills electronically just like Nairobi residents do," Micheni said. 
The company recently launched services in Uganda as well. Kenya 
Christian MPs will join the anti-gay caucus committee in a protest against homosexuality on Monday. see more » Copyright © 2015 The Star. All rights reserved.
